channel.title: RuneX Development Team [Added Pics]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/bgch1.gif[/img] [/center] [center][b]Welcome To RuneX Developmental team[/b][/center]
[center][b]Server Information:[/b] Server Name: RuneX Server base: OverloadX Owners: David(me)[/center]
[center][b]What Are my goals?[/b] Stable Server Good Staff Good economy Decent amount of players online Last Fun to Play :)[/center]
[size=14pt][b]We need some that can make a webclient! You can apply by posting underneath.[/b][/size]
[center][b]Hey everyone i am David and i have started this project named RuneX. If i have time, i work on it 2-3 hours a day. i want this to be a successfull server and really enjoyable for everyone. I will be buying a vps, hostname, and fourms once i am done with server sided coding. I do not have any picture's yet, i am to lazy to put them up. as soon as i get some time i will get some pictures and post them on here.Most of you want to know what did i do so far? underneath there is everything i have done.[/b][/center]
[center][b]What have i done?[/b][/center] [center][size=14pt] Visit the fourms here http://www.Rune-X.com[/size][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]Update List[/b][/size][/center] [center][code]Redone all teleports Added new places to train Aded new shops Added Slayer tower Added working Slayer point system Added slayer point shop Deleted some not needed customs Fixed some gfx/anim problems Added correct whip special, attack req, and walking Added new commands Added ::shops Fixed some custom glitches Added checkbank system New pking Spots added Added Slayer helm Added korsai's Sword Edited Quest tab Fixed some skill bugs Added bosses Added Drops Added taverly + brimhaven Dungeon Added teleporting from mage book In-Game hiscores Added (works for the top 10 total levels) Added A slayer Point shop Readded Vesta,Statius,Morrigans [all were glitched] [/code][/center]
[center][size=24pt][b]Media[/b][/size][/center]
[center]Splash Screen: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/Splash.png[/img]
Overloads: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/overloads.png[/img]
Stats after Overloads: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/Status.png[/img]
Korsai's Sword: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/Korsais.png[/img]
Customs: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/Customs.png[/img] [/center]
Random: [IMG]http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa459/RuneX-Gaming/RUNEXRANDOM.gif[/img] [center][b]What we need[/b][/center] [center]Website Designer 1/1 -Xx Weed Xx [Dan] Gfx designer: 1/1 -Joshua9821 [Joshua Hill] Beta tester: 0/3 Server Coder: 1/2 Advertiser: 0/1 [/center]
[center][b]How to apply
Website Designer:[/b][/center]
[center][code]Name Age Experience: Proof of work: Will you use, HTML, CSS, PHP, etc.: Why do you want this job?: Msn:[/code][/center]
[center][b]Gfx Designer:[/b][/center]
[center][code]Name: Age: Msn: Proof of work: Experience:[/code][/center]
[center][b]Beta Tester:[/b][/center]
[center][code][center]Name: Age: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Msn:[/code][/center]
[center][b]Server Coder:[/b][/center]
[center][code]Name: Age: Experience in coding: Rate your self 1-10: What can you code: Msn:[/code][/center]

item.title: RuneX Development Team [Added Pics]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[Beta Tester Application]
Name: Andrew
Age: 15
How active will you be: Server - daily (hours unknown, high due to summer coming up), Forums (if there are any) - anytime during the sun is up and probably night too.
Any experience in this?:I’ve owned about 5 servers, was administrator on several others, and moderator on countless. Servers I join seem to disappear and I try to always find a home server. I’ve had 3 years in learning coding from my own trial and error and I’ve learned up to 508. I then moved onto HTML, C++, PHP, ect. I love playing RSPS but I can never find one. I’ve also had 3+years in being a “community manager” for forums where I handled everything talking to people about updates and bug fixes and dealing with the forums directly.
Msn: matsterofwar22@hotmail.com
I’d love to do anything you ask me

Read full topic

item.title: RuneX Development Team [Added Pics]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:23, topic:395894”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=493080.msg3612287#msg3612287 date=1306691443]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=493080.msg3612244#msg3612244 date=1306688759]

Mind tossing me the Pkers cape models and ints?
[/quote]download overloadx

I downloaded it but where’s it load the models. Lol
[/quote]look in cache for the .dat files and look in in itemdef in client for the int

Raw folder is empty

i have the ints but not the model… here are the ints

case 15319: //item Id
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelID = 53007;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 500;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 14;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -6;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 53006;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 53006;
itemDef.anInt175 = -1;
itemDef.anInt197 = -1;
itemDef.anInt199 = -1;
itemDef.name = “PKers cape”; // Get Blitz
itemDef.description = “A cape only achieved through the slaughting of many people.”.getBytes();
break;[/quote]
I already converted it.
/if(i == 13789) { //item Id
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 53007;
class8.anInt181 = 2000;
class8.anInt190 = 500;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 14;
class8.anInt194 = -6;
class8.anInt165 = 53006;
class8.anInt200 = 53006;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
//itemDef.anInt199 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “PKers cape”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A cape only achieved through the slaughting of many people.”.getBytes();
}/
I just need models

Read full topic
